column4: ﻿amazen720: ﻿do you have ndiswrapper installed now ? the page pretty much describes, quite nicely, how to configure it. follow the steps just as they are, and then after reboot, you can se Network Manager to configure the wifi card
﻿amazen720: ok , have you gone through the steps on that page that configures NdisWrapper ?
﻿amazen720: you need to blacklist what is said to do so, then you need to use ndiswrapper to install driver using the "working" windows driver.
﻿amazen720:  after you do the command (this will tell you if install went good) >  ndiswrapper -l
﻿amazen720: let me know if you get a good message such as "driver present, hardware present"
﻿amazen720:  Load the new driver module section if ﻿"driver present, hardware present"
﻿﻿amazen720:   you went through every step right ?
I've followed the steps but I cant get it work
I can't leave it on 'enable roaming mode'?
can you please give a step by step instuction
wlan0: ERROR while getting interface flags: No such device
